features: Fixed admin notifications for status changes - improved admin user query and added comprehensive logging
Fixed change history - status changes and all field updates now properly tracked
Fixed push notifications - Cloud Functions send FCM notifications when notifications are created
Improved contact saving - added timeouts and error handling for OnePlus and custom Android skins
Enhanced audit logging - individual field changes tracked when editing enquiries
Better error handling - graceful fallbacks prevent crashes on problematic devices
Fixed image uploads - Firebase Storage properly configured with correct bucket and CORS
Image persistence - reference images now properly saved and visible to all users
bugFixes: Fixed admin notifications missing for status changes - improved admin user query (no longer requires isActive field) and added comprehensive logging
Fixed change history not showing status changes - now stores status values instead of labels
Fixed contact saving crashes on OnePlus phones - added comprehensive error handling and timeouts
Fixed push notifications not working - added Cloud Functions to send FCM notifications
Fixed audit logging missing for enquiry edits - now tracks all individual field changes
Fixed repository status updates not recording audit logs - added audit trail support
Fixed image upload CORS errors - configured Firebase Storage CORS for web uploads
Fixed image storage - images field now properly updated when editing enquiries
Fixed Firebase Storage bucket configuration - using correct bucket name for web
